Escalate {2} [i](Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)[/i]
Choose one or more –
• Sanaki's Arcfire deals 3 damage to up to two targets.
• Discard your hand, then exile the top card of your library for each card you discarded. You may play the exiled cards until the end of your next turn.
• Creatures target player controls can't block this turn.
